td.content: s:a 72 yo F retired presents with critical feeling full quickly when patient does eat, critical weight loss, Blood. she has history of critical malaise. denies any alcohol use she has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking o:Height 61 in, Weight 179 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 16, Bone marrow biopsy shows hypercellularity with elevated myeloid to erythroid ratio a:Leukemia p:administered imatinib - 400 mg daily, performed Bone marrow biopsy, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:a white F aged 73 yrs presents with critical feeling full quickly when patient does eat, critical malaise, Blood. pt also reports of critical weight loss. denies any alcohol use pt reports that she smokes once or twice daily o:Height 61 in, Weight 178 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Leukemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to hematology.

td.content: s:a 73 yo F presents with critical weight loss, critical feeling full quickly when patient does eat, critical malaise and Blood. she is having symptoms 16-18 x day, in spite of treatment. she denies drinking alcohol she has a history of smoking o:Height 61 in, Weight 177 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Leukemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed imatinib - 400 mg daily, and ordered Allogeneic Stem Cell Transplantation - BM.
